kv8.2:5.18: Kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare atthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:5.23: Rūpabhavassa ca arūpabhavassa ca antare atthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:6.1: Kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:6.3: Hañci kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:6.5: Rūpabhavassa ca arūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:6.7: Hañci rūpabhavassa ca arūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:7.3: Pañcamī sā yoni, chaṭṭhamī sā gati, aṭṭhamī sā viññāṇaṭṭhiti, dasamo so sattāvāsoti?
kv8.2:7.8: Antarābhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṃsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:7.17: antarābhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:7.20: antarābhave atthi rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:8.1: Atthi kāmabhavo, kāmabhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṃsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:8.3: Atthi antarābhavo, antarābhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṃsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:8.16: kāmabhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:8.18: Antarābhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:8.21: kāmabhave atthi rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:8.23: Antarābhave atthi rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:9.1: Atthi rūpabhavo, rūpabhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṃsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:9.3: Atthi antarābhavo, antarābhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṃsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:9.16: rūpabhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:9.18: Antarābhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:9.21: rūpabhave atthi rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:9.23: Antarābhave atthi rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:10.1: Atthi arūpabhavo, arūpabhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṃsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:10.3: Atthi antarābhavo, antarābhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṃsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:10.16: arūpabhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:10.18: Antarābhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:10.21: arūpabhave atthi vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:10.23: Antarābhave atthi vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:11.8: Hañci sabbesaññeva sattānaṃ natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:12.8: Hañci ānantariyassa puggalassa natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:13.20: Hañci arūpūpagassa puggalassa natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:15.5: Hañci antarāparinibbāyī puggalo atthi, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:16.1: Antarāparinibbāyī puggalo atthīti katvā atthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:16.3: Upahaccaparinibbāyī puggalo atthīti katvā atthi upahaccabhavoti?
kv8.2:16.6: antarāparinibbāyī puggalo atthīti katvā atthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:16.10: sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī puggalo atthīti katvā atthi sasaṅkhārabhavoti?
